text: James Kelvin "Kelly" Burnett (June 16, 1926 â€“ December 22, 2018) was a Canadian ice hockey centre. He played in the NHL for the New York Rangers. He was born in Lachine, Quebec. Burnett died on December 22, 2018 in Halifax, Nova Scotia at the age of 92.Obituary: James Kelvin "Kelly" Burnett ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2018 deaths Category:New York Rangers players Category:Ice hockey people from Quebec Category:Sportspeople from Montreal Category:Ice hockey centres
